verbs.description: [ARG0: authorities] [V: find] [ARG1: body of third child killed in illinois town kankakee] ill ap authorities identified the skeletal remains of a third child found dead in this town in recent months but police said that so far they have no evidence linking the cases police said they are investigating the death of 13-year - old lisa grice as a homicide lisa disappeared in april from a foster home said her mother robbie vanschoyck her remains were found friday and identified monday lisa attended the same school as ophelia williams a 13-year - old girl who was sexually assaulted and stabbed to death in march and the girls were friends vanschoyck said ophelia killer remains at large murder christopher meyer timothy buss sheriff bernie thompson robbie vanschoyck ill lewis williams chicago kankakee illinois town kankakee river state park ophelia williams lisa grice
